They share many similarities in themes and narrative structure, but differences in specific settings, character interactions, and particular ideological elements reduce the overall similarity.

However, 'Raiders of the Lost Ark' focuses more on the Middle East and Egypt, while 'The Last Crusade' includes significant scenes in Europe, especially Italy and Austria.
